name: Last Choice
description:
This is the first game jam  and also this is the first game that we created ......

hope u enjoy the game : )

once upon a time there was a war between people and the man who had some special powers. in that war, the
man with powers destroyed half of the peoples.at that time cupid came there to stop that he need to shoot the 
lead arrow towards the man , but the bow of the cupid only works if both gold and lead arrows are there,so
he decided to shoot the both arrows in different people of different sex.so atlast that
cupid shoots a golden arrow towards the normal women and the lead arrow to the men who has special powers ,
who came to attack the people.
 after the arrow attacks ,the women fall in love with the man and made him as her desire because he is the one
who was in the front when the arrow attacks.but that moster is not interested in her.but she is following the man
so to make her to unfollow him he created enemies,traps and others to stop her
